summary: A mod which allows to be added a great deal of items of skill(competence) or even more...
descriptionHtml:
[center][quote][color=#e69138][size=6]BatGiveConsole[/size][/color][/quote][/center]

[color=#e06666][size=5]Installation: [/size][/color][size=4] [color=#cccccc]Place all the files TXT example "Skyrimx***********" in the folder Skyrim [/color][/size]
[size=4][color=#cccccc] [/color][color=#f4cccc](No Requis) --->[/color][color=#cccccc] Place "BatGiveConsole.esp" in the folder "Skyrim / Data"[/color][/size]

[color=#e06666][size=5]How works the mod? [/size][/color]

[size=4]Begin by Opening the console with "²" where "~" [/size]

[size=4]And bang "Bat ***********" [/size]

[size=4]Replaced "***********" by the availade words in the list down.[/size]

[color=#e06666][size=6]List: [/size][/color]

[color=#00ffff][size=5]- SkyrimxAllArrows
[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=5]- SkyrimxAllSoulGem
[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=5]- SkyrimxAllStuff
[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=5]- SkyrimxHealth
